inventory=[{"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to craft yellow_dye. I have a dandelion at slot 38. I need to place it in the crafting grid. I will place it in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
